actor_awards.notes: Renowned for her speed in tap dancing, claiming to tap 500 times per minute.

filmography.title: Stage Door
filmography.role_description: A spirited young dancer and boarding house resident who partners with Ginger Rogers; Miller's breakout role at age 14.
filmography.plot: A boarding house full of aspiring actresses is thrown into turmoil when a wealthy debutante moves in.
filmography.awards: National Board of Review: Top Ten Films

filmography.title: You Can't Take It With You
filmography.role_description: The eccentric, ballet-obsessed daughter of the Sycamore family who dances through life (literally) in this screwball classic.
filmography.plot: A man from a family of rich snobs becomes engaged to a woman from a good-natured but decidedly eccentric family.

filmography.title: Room Service
filmography.role_description: The love interest of the young playwright in this Marx Brothers comedy set in a hotel.
filmography.plot: A cash-strapped theatrical producer tries to avoid eviction from his hotel room while trying to get a play produced.

filmography.title: Too Many Girls
filmography.role_description: A lively college student and dancer in this musical comedy where Lucille Ball met Desi Arnaz.
filmography.plot: A wealthy heiress goes to college in New Mexico, accompanied by four football players hired as her bodyguards.

filmography.title: Melody Ranch
filmography.role_description: The love interest of Gene Autry in this western musical, showcasing her dancing skills in a frontier setting.
filmography.plot: A radio singing cowboy returns to his hometown to find it controlled by three brothers who are creating lawlessness.

filmography.title: Time Out for Rhythm
filmography.role_description: A talented tap dancer who gets her big break in a show produced by rival talent agents.
filmography.plot: Two talent agents dissolve their partnership over a woman, but their paths cross again when they discover a new star.

filmography.title: True to the Army
filmography.role_description: A high-wire performer who hides out in an army camp to escape gangsters.
filmography.plot: A circus performer seeks refuge in an army camp, leading to musical mayhem and romance.

filmography.title: Priorities on Parade
filmography.role_description: A dancer who takes a job in an aircraft factory to help the war effort and boost morale.
filmography.plot: Swing musicians and entertainers work in an aircraft factory to support the war effort and put on a show.

filmography.title: Reveille with Beverly
filmography.role_description: A radio DJ who plays swing music for the troops, becoming a sensation.
filmography.plot: A young woman runs a radio show dedicated to servicemen, featuring appearances by top musical acts of the era.

filmography.title: What's Buzzin', Cousin?
filmography.role_description: A woman who inherits a run-down hotel and tries to turn it into a success with the help of a band.
filmography.plot: A young woman inherits a hotel and tries to make it profitable, getting help from a band leader and his crew.

filmography.title: Jam Session
filmography.role_description: A young dancer from Kansas who wins a contest to go to Hollywood and tries to break into pictures.
filmography.plot: A dancer wins a trip to Hollywood and tries to get a role in a movie, encountering famous jazz musicians along the way.

filmography.title: Hey, Rookie
filmography.role_description: A musical comedy star who gets involved with an army show produced by her producer-turned-soldier.
filmography.plot: A producer drafted into the army puts on a show for the troops, with complications provided by his former leading lady.

filmography.title: Carolina Blues
filmography.role_description: A singer who poses as a wealthy society girl to help a band leader raise money for war bonds.
filmography.plot: A band leader tries to raise money for a war bond rally and gets help from a talented singer with a secret.

filmography.title: Eadie Was a Lady
filmography.role_description: A college student who leads a double life as a burlesque dancer at night.
filmography.plot: A demure college student moonlights as a burlesque queen, trying to keep her two lives separate.

filmography.title: Eve Knew Her Apples
filmography.role_description: A famous radio singer who goes on the run to escape her managers and finds romance on the road.
filmography.plot: A radio star runs away from her demanding career and hides out in the trunk of a reporter's car.
filmography.awards: Musical Remake of 'It Happened One Night'

filmography.title: Easter Parade
filmography.role_description: The glamorous former dance partner of Don Hewes who strikes out on a solo career; features her iconic 'Shakin' the Blues Away' number.
filmography.plot: A nightclub performer hires a naive chorus girl to become his new partner to make his former partner jealous.

filmography.title: The Kissing Bandit
filmography.role_description: A featured dancer who performs a spectacular 'Dance of Fury' sequence.
filmography.plot: A timid young man returns to California to take over his father's business, only to find out his father was a notorious bandit.

filmography.title: On the Town
filmography.role_description: An anthropology student who finds her 'Prehistoric Man' in the form of a sailor (Jules Munshin) at a museum.
filmography.plot: Three sailors on a day of shore leave in New York City look for romance and adventure.

filmography.title: Watch the Birdie
filmography.role_description: A beauty contest winner who becomes involved with a bumbling photographer played by Red Skelton.
filmography.plot: A camera shop owner tries to get pictures of the rich and famous but gets mixed up in a plot to swindle a wealthy girl.

filmography.title: Two Tickets to Broadway
filmography.role_description: A showgirl trying to make it big who helps her friends get a spot on a TV show.
filmography.plot: A group of college students try to get their variety act on a television show.

filmography.title: Lovely to Look At
filmography.role_description: A Broadway dancer who follows her boyfriend to Paris where he has inherited a dress shop.
filmography.plot: Three producers inherit a dress shop in Paris and try to save it from bankruptcy.

filmography.title: Small Town Girl
filmography.role_description: A Broadway star whose romance with a playboy is complicated when he gets arrested in a small town; features the famous 'I've Gotta Hear That Beat' number.
filmography.plot: A judge's daughter falls for a wealthy playboy who has been sentenced to 30 days in the local jail.

filmography.title: Kiss Me Kate
filmography.role_description: A flirtatious actress playing Bianca in a musical version of 'The Taming of the Shrew,' delivering the show-stopping 'Too Darn Hot'.
filmography.plot: Divorced actors Fred and Lilli are reunited for a musical adaptation of 'The Taming of the Shrew,' where their onstage battles mirror their offstage relationship.

filmography.title: Deep in My Heart
filmography.role_description: A featured dancer performing the spirited 'It' number in this biopic of Sigmund Romberg.
filmography.plot: A biography of the Hungarian-born composer Sigmund Romberg, featuring cameos by many MGM stars.

filmography.title: Hit the Deck
filmography.role_description: A nightclub star who is pursued by a sailor (Tony Martin) in this nautical musical.
filmography.plot: Three sailors on shore leave in San Francisco find romance and complications with three different women.

filmography.title: The Opposite Sex
filmography.role_description: A glamorous showgirl and friend to the protagonist in this musical remake of 'The Women'.
filmography.plot: A woman discovers her husband is having an affair and divorces him, but later decides to fight to win him back.

filmography.title: The Great American Pastime
filmography.role_description: A widowed mother who gets involved with a Little League team manager; Miller's last film for MGM.
filmography.plot: A lawyer takes over a Little League baseball team to bond with his son, but deals with overbearing parents.

filmography.title: Mulholland Drive
filmography.role_description: The eccentric landlady of an apartment complex who welcomes the protagonist to Hollywood; Miller's final film role.
filmography.plot: After a car wreck on the winding Mulholland Drive renders a woman amnesiac, she and a perky Hollywood-hopeful search for clues and answers across Los Angeles.
filmography.awards: Cannes Film Festival: Win – Best Director
